dimcat.writer package¶

Submodules¶

dimcat.writer.base module¶

Writers are pipeline steps that write (potentially processed) data to disk.

class dimcat.writer.base.TSVWriter(directory: str, prefix: Optional[str] = None, index: bool = True, round: Optional[int] = None, fillna: Optional[Any] = None)[source]¶

Bases: PipelineStep

This writer iterates through the processed data (pandas objects) and writes each to a TSV file with a file name individually constructed based on the applied pipeline steps.

make_group_filenames(data: GroupedData) → dict[source]¶

Returns a {group -> filename} dict.

make_index_filenames(data: Dataset) → dict[source]¶

Returns a {group -> filename} dict.

process_data(data: Dataset) → Dataset[source]¶

Perform a transformation on an input Data object. This should never alter the Data or its properties in place, instead returning a copy or view of the input.

Parameters:

data (Data) – The data to be transformed. This should not be altered in place.

Returns:

A copy or view of the input Data, transformed in some way defined by this PipelineStep.

Return type:

Data
